# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(basic_run LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(basic_run "")
set_target_properties(basic_run PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "basic_run")
set_target_properties(basic_run PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/arm64/release")
target_include_directories(basic_run PRIVATE
    src
)
target_include_directories(basic_run PRIVATE
    /opt/homebrew/Cellar/zlib/1.2.12/include
)
target_compile_options(basic_run PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:arm64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:arm64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-mmacosx-version-min=12.3>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-mmacosx-version-min=12.3>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
target_compile_features(basic_run PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(basic_run PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(basic_run PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET basic_run PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(basic_run PRIVATE
    z
    z
)
target_link_directories(basic_run PRIVATE
    /opt/homebrew/Cellar/zlib/1.2.12/lib
)
target_link_options(basic_run PRIVATE
    -mmacosx-version-min=12.3
    -stdlib=libc++
)
target_sources(basic_run PRIVATE
    sample/basic_run.cpp
)

# target
add_library(carpo SHARED "")
set_target_properties(carpo PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "carpo")
set_target_properties(carpo PROPERTIES LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/arm64/release")
target_include_directories(carpo PRIVATE
    src
)
target_include_directories(carpo PRIVATE
    /Users/dylan/.xmake/packages/a/asio/1.21.0/8cf1d852d3b64372a96f26bc47667497/include
    /opt/homebrew/Cellar/zlib/1.2.12/include
)
target_compile_options(carpo PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:arm64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:arm64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-mmacosx-version-min=12.3>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-mmacosx-version-min=12.3>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
target_compile_features(carpo PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(carpo PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(carpo PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET carpo PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(carpo PRIVATE
    z
    z
)
target_link_directories(carpo PRIVATE
    /opt/homebrew/Cellar/zlib/1.2.12/lib
)
target_link_options(carpo PRIVATE
    -mmacosx-version-min=12.3
    -isysroot
    -stdlib=libc++
)
target_sources(carpo PRIVATE
    src/loop/loop.cpp
    src/loop/router_handle.cpp
    src/loop/client.cpp
    src/loop/run_module.cpp
    src/loop/num_router.cpp
    src/loop/base_component.cpp
    src/loop/session.cpp
    src/loop/carpo.cpp
    src/loop/server.cpp
)

# target
add_executable(server_sample "")
set_target_properties(server_sample PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "server_sample")
set_target_properties(server_sample PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/arm64/release")
target_include_directories(server_sample PRIVATE
    src
)
target_include_directories(server_sample PRIVATE
    /Users/dylan/.xmake/packages/a/asio/1.21.0/8cf1d852d3b64372a96f26bc47667497/include
    /opt/homebrew/Cellar/zlib/1.2.12/include
)
target_compile_options(server_sample PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:arm64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:arm64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-mmacosx-version-min=12.3>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-mmacosx-version-min=12.3>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
target_compile_features(server_sample PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(server_sample PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(server_sample PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET server_sample PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(server_sample PRIVATE
    z
    z
)
target_link_directories(server_sample PRIVATE
    /opt/homebrew/Cellar/zlib/1.2.12/lib
)
target_link_options(server_sample PRIVATE
    -mmacosx-version-min=12.3
    -stdlib=libc++
)
target_sources(server_sample PRIVATE
    sample/server_sample.cpp
